article_title: Exotic dancers sue Roanoke nightclub over wages
article_text:

The $1.99 will be billed to your credit card immediately by PayPalPro. After the first month, your total susbscription price will be $15.47 per month.

og.description: Three exotic dancers have sued the Roanoke nightclub where they perform over the size of their paychecks.
